archimate:Product.name: NLTK
archimate:Product.documentation: The Natural Language Toolkit, or more commonly NLTK, is a suite of libraries and programs for symbolic and statistical natural language processing for English written in the Python programming language. With NLTK, we can search for a word meaning by using a built-in lexical database called WordNet. WordNet presents nouns, verbs, adjectives, and adverbs grouped in sets of cognitive synonyms — synsets — with each synset representing a distinct concept. https://www.nltk.org/
